message.body: Life's great (got the day off). Yourself?
Life's fine! I'm doing work but I've got the window open and it's a nice day :)
Gorgeous day. Are you in Philly or Boston?
I'm close to Philly-- in Newark DE. Where are you? And why those choices? :P
Oh, I've only talked to people from Philly
and Boston, so i thought those were the test areas
Yeah! I guess since its a study by penn most people who hear about it are in Philly. I heard via email because I'm in a linguistics program
It is a weird study though-- these dont really feel like 'natural' texts since they're with strangers!!
I know, the texts are donate are completely illegible.
Ha, and with these I even use freakin punctuation!
Seriously! Haha. I guess in theory they can track how many times you talk to one person and then how nonstandard your texts become over time....or something...
I never got the same person twice though!
Yeah, and when you mix these normal texts with the ones
You pry come out with a pretty good bell curve
Yeah! And that's the thing, usually I just text 1-3 times max to make plans or check on someone, but not typically to have conversations!
